reporting-org.narrative: European Commission - DG Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations

title.narrative: Improvement of Regional Statistics in the Republic of Moldova

description.narrative: The purpose of this contract is to support the Republic of Moldova in improving of regional statistics as a basis for improved, evidence-based policy planning, programming, monitoring and evaluation.

title.narrative: Improvement of Regional Statistics in the Republic of Moldova
Degree of preparedness of the National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) to conduct regional agricultural production surveys in compliance with Eurostat standards

description.narrative: Degree of preparedness of the National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) to conduct regional agricultural production surveys in compliance with Eurostat standards

title.narrative: Degree of preparedness of the National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) to conduct regional agricultural production surveys in compliance with Eurostat standards

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: Inadequate degree of preparedness of the NBS

comment.narrative: Inadequate degree of preparedness of the NBS

actual.value: NBS enabled to conduct full-scale agricultural production surveys ensuring compliance with Eurostat standards
